definitions.definition: Sexual intercourse by a married person with someone other than their spouse.
definitions.example: She engaged in adultery because her spouse has a low libido, while hers is very high.

definitions.definition: Lewdness or unchastity of thought as well as act, as forbidden by the seventh commandment.
The fine and penalty formerly imposed for the offence of adultery.
The intrusion of a person into a bishopric during the life of the bishop.
